mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sso_dept_tree_path WHERE descendant IN (SELECT a.dept_id from (SELECT descendant dept_id FROM sso_dept_tree_path WHERE ancestor = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) a )
mapper.select: SELECT c.* FROM sso_dept AS c INNER JOIN sso_dept_tree_path t ON c.dept_id = t.descendant WHERE t.ancestor = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
